law.catch_line: Subject to the approval of the Commissioner, an insurer may:...
law.text:
Subject to the approval of the Commissioner, an insurer may:
offer or administer a health benefit program under which the insurer offers preferred provider insurance policies that limit, through the use of provider service contracts, the numbers and types of providers of health care services eligible for payment as preferred providers; and
establish terms and conditions that providers must meet to qualify for payment as preferred providers.
